content:
Certainly, as an AI language model, I can provide some information about the traditional musical instruments played during the Gaddi festival celebrated in the Himachal Pradesh region. Here are some of them:

1. Drum (Dhol)
2. Shehnai (a wind instrument)
3. Tumbaknari (a percussion instrument)
4. Algoza (a double flute)
5. Nagara (a kettledrum)
6. Chimta (a clapper)
7. Karnal (a trumpet)
8. Thali (a plate)

These instruments are typically played during the Gaddi festival, which is celebrated in the months of August and September in the Himachal Pradesh region of India. The festival is all about celebrating the bounties of nature and the harvest season with traditional dance, music, and food.
